name: ContinuousAlgEquiv.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁸ : Semiring A
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁶ : Semiring B
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace B
inst✝⁴ : Algebra R A
inst✝³ : Algebra R B
inst✝² : SizeOf R
inst✝¹ : SizeOf A
inst✝ : SizeOf B
toAlgEquiv : AlgEquiv R A B
continuous_toFun : autoParam (Continuous toAlgEquiv.toFun) _auto✝
continuous_invFun : autoParam (Continuous toAlgEquiv.invFun) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { toAlgEquiv := toAlgEquiv, continuous_toFun := continuous_toFun, continuous_invFun := continuous_invFun }) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf toAlgEquiv)) (SizeOf.sizeOf continuous_toFun)) (SizeOf.sizeOf continuous_invFun))
decl:
/--
`ContinuousAlgEquiv R A B`, with notation `A ≃A[R] B`, is the type of bijections
between the topological `R`-algebras `A` and `B` which are both homeomorphisms
and `R`-algebra isomorphisms.
-/
structure ContinuousAlgEquiv (R A B : Type*) [CommSemiring R]
    [Semiring A] [TopologicalSpace A] [Semiring B] [TopologicalSpace B] [Algebra R A]
    [Algebra R B] extends A ≃ₐ[R] B, A ≃ₜ B

name: ContinuousAlgEquivClass.toAlgEquivClass
initialProofState:
F : Type u_1
R : outParam (Type u_2)
A : outParam (Type u_3)
B : outParam (Type u_4)
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : Semiring B
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace B
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Algebra R B
inst✝ : EquivLike F A B
self : ContinuousAlgEquivClass F R A B
⊢ AlgEquivClass F R A B
decl:
/--
`ContinuousAlgEquivClass F R A B` states that `F` is a type of topological algebra
  structure-preserving equivalences. You should extend this class when you
  extend `ContinuousAlgEquiv`.
-/
class ContinuousAlgEquivClass (F : Type*) (R A B : outParam Type*) [CommSemiring R]
    [Semiring A] [TopologicalSpace A] [Semiring B] [TopologicalSpace B]
    [Algebra R A] [Algebra R B] [EquivLike F A B]
    extends AlgEquivClass F R A B, HomeomorphClass F A B : Prop

name: ContinuousAlgEquivClass.toHomeomorphClass
initialProofState:

A : outParam (Type u_3)
B : outParam (Type u_4)
inst✝⁷ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁶ : Semiring A
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝⁴ : Semiring B
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace B
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Algebra R B
inst✝ : EquivLike F A B
self : ContinuousAlgEquivClass F R A B
⊢ HomeomorphClass F A B
decl:
/--
`ContinuousAlgEquivClass F R A B` states that `F` is a type of topological algebra
  structure-preserving equivalences. You should extend this class when you
  extend `ContinuousAlgEquiv`.
-/
class ContinuousAlgEquivClass (F : Type*) (R A B : outParam Type*) [CommSemiring R]
    [Semiring A] [TopologicalSpace A] [Semiring B] [TopologicalSpace B]
    [Algebra R A] [Algebra R B] [EquivLike F A B]
    extends AlgEquivClass F R A B, HomeomorphClass F A B : Prop

name: ContinuousAlgEquiv.continuousAlgEquivClass
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁶ : CommSemiring R
inst✝⁵ : Semiring A
inst✝⁴ : TopologicalSpace A
inst✝³ : Semiring B
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace B
inst✝¹ : Algebra R A
inst✝ : Algebra R B
⊢ ContinuousAlgEquivClass (ContinuousAlgEquiv R A B) R A B
decl:
instance continuousAlgEquivClass : ContinuousAlgEquivClass (A ≃A[R] B) R A B where
  map_add f := f.map_add'
  map_mul f := f.map_mul'
  commutes f := f.commutes'
  map_continuous := continuous_toFun
  inv_continuous := continuous_invFun

@[simp]
theorem apply_symm_apply (e : A ≃A[R] B) (b : B) : e (e.symm b) = b :=
  e.1.right_inv b

name: ContinuousAlgEquiv.isUniformEmbedding
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
E₁ : Type u_5
E₂ : Type u_6
inst✝⁷ : UniformSpace E₁
inst✝⁶ : UniformSpace E₂
inst✝⁵ : Ring E₁
inst✝⁴ : UniformAddGroup E₁
inst✝³ : Algebra R E₁
inst✝² : Ring E₂
inst✝¹ : UniformAddGroup E₂
inst✝ : Algebra R E₂
e : ContinuousAlgEquiv R E₁ E₂
⊢ IsUniformEmbedding ⇑e
decl:
theorem isUniformEmbedding {E₁ E₂ : Type*} [UniformSpace E₁] [UniformSpace E₂] [Ring E₁]
    [UniformAddGroup E₁] [Algebra R E₁] [Ring E₂] [UniformAddGroup E₂] [Algebra R E₂]
    (e : E₁ ≃A[R] E₂) : IsUniformEmbedding e :=
  e.toAlgEquiv.isUniformEmbedding e.toContinuousAlgHom.uniformContinuous
    e.symm.toContinuousAlgHom.uniformContinuous

name: AlgEquiv.isUniformEmbedding
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝⁸ : CommSemiring R
E₁ : Type u_5
E₂ : Type u_6
inst✝⁷ : UniformSpace E₁
inst✝⁶ : UniformSpace E₂
inst✝⁵ : Ring E₁
inst✝⁴ : UniformAddGroup E₁
inst✝³ : Algebra R E₁
inst✝² : Ring E₂
inst✝¹ : UniformAddGroup E₂
inst✝ : Algebra R E₂
e : AlgEquiv R E₁ E₂
h₁ : Continuous ⇑e
h₂ : Continuous ⇑e.symm
⊢ IsUniformEmbedding ⇑e
decl:
theorem _root_.AlgEquiv.isUniformEmbedding {E₁ E₂ : Type*} [UniformSpace E₁] [UniformSpace E₂]
    [Ring E₁] [UniformAddGroup E₁] [Algebra R E₁] [Ring E₂] [UniformAddGroup E₂] [Algebra R E₂]
    (e : E₁ ≃ₐ[R] E₂) (h₁ : Continuous e) (h₂ : Continuous e.symm) :
    IsUniformEmbedding e :=
  ContinuousAlgEquiv.isUniformEmbedding { e with continuous_toFun := h₁ }
